Articles.Content:
Okay, I recently watched this video from a YouTube person I watch a lot, named CavemanFilms.

Let me just say, I never thought I would be scared by a gaming YouTube video.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/g34s1f7nFHU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Googled SCP, I got this. [http://www.scp-wiki.net/](http://www.scp-wiki.net/)

Anyone know more about this so called, SCP?

DIS IS FREAKY. ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Edit: Watched too many of these SCP videos, literally, I am shaking right now.
All I have to say is watch pewdiepie play scp 8)

Yeah... Read the actual SCPs.

Which I have never had.

> 
> All I have to say is watch pewdiepie play scp 8)

I actually have started that. Episode 2. :3
Brofist?
YEAH!

Yeah, they\'re pretty dayum interesting. Some are creepy, some not. They\'ll make you laugh, and they\'ll make you cry. 

Been reading them for a few years now.

> 
> Yeah, they\'re pretty dayum interesting. Some are creepy, some not. They\'ll make you laugh, and they\'ll make you cry. 
> 
> Been reading them for a few years now.

I\'ve read a couple, I find SCP-173 Euclid to be the most interesting.

It\'s just SCP-173, or 173 for short. Euclid is just a designation for how dangerous they are.

[More info](http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-object-classes)
The pic of 173 is scary ;\_;

Many of them are a lot worse, IMHO. 173 just gets all the publicity. I\'ll see if I can\'t find one.

EDIT: Here\'s a list, to be updated as I see fit, of some of the more disturbing ones. 

Unless otherwise marked, all spoilers contain images that may be disturbing to some (no pr0n, though). You have been warned.

> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-610](http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-610)

> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-106](http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-106)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UBLIAasOfxk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Scary ones -

173

That Ammo Box

Old scary wall guy

231

That demonic airplane

Police cruiser

001

Underwater tentacle raep monster

Canadian blood pool hellgate

Funny ones -

Sentient lego

Sentient playdough

Coffee Machine

Food dispenser

Fred

Badass ones -

682

Able

Dr. Bright

That one vampire dude

Just a friendly guide. I\'ll keep you updated.

*Signed*

Dr. [REDACTED]

> 
> Yeah... Read the actual SCPs.
> 
> Which I have never had.

You should. 176 is a decent starting point (it is the classic one, after all). SCPs 087, 093, 140, and 966 are also good in my opinion.
edit: hrm. I haven\'t been in #site19 in way too long...
The experiment logs of the coffee machine are some of the best writing I\'ve read on the site.

> 
> Many of them are a lot worse, IMHO. 173 just gets all the publicity. I\'ll see if I can\'t find one.
> 
> EDIT: Here\'s a list, to be updated as I see fit, of some of the more disturbing ones. 
> 
> Unless otherwise marked, all spoilers contain images that may be disturbing to some (no pr0n, though). You have been warned.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-610](http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-610)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-106](http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-106)

610. First reaction = WHAT THE FUCK!

> 
> 610. First reaction = WHAT THE FUCK!

Indeeed!
You guys never heard of the SCP Foundation before? Comon, even I had! :b
I have. I just didnt know about the flesh that hates.

[This](http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1733) is a good one I read today, along with a [tale](http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/we-interrupt-this-program) that is in the same 'universe'

Very creepy, and yet very intriguing.
I\'ve been thinking of downloading that, except from reading the site\'s forums it seems it has a few glaring bugs that need to be worked out. I\'ve been waiting to try it out.

[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-078-j](http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-078-j)

I lol\'d.

If there is any SCP I will have nightmares about it is this one. (Can\'t type properly for some reason right now.)

> [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-087](http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-087)

Should probably rename the thread to SCP Megathread

What if SCPs were bees?

What if I were bees?

What if KSP were bees?

[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bees](http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bees)

> 
> Should probably rename the thread to SCP Megathread
> 
> What if SCPs were bees?
> 
> What if I were bees?
> 
> What if KSP were bees?
> 
> [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bees](http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bees)

I will do that.
